name: Where's My Wallet?
description:
Global Game Jam Solo Project                    Theme: Lost & Found Controls: 

W A S D to walk around and SPACE to jump. LEFT MOUSE CLICK to extend the left arm RIGHT MOUSE CLICK to extend the right arm. Q to release left hand, E to release right hand.
